ReportSection.title: Rebuttal
ReportSection.Static: As per the Faculty Evaluation Standards and Procedures, after being informed of the Chair's recommendation, any academic faculty member may provide, at least 4 weeks prior to the meeting of FEC, a one-page letter of rebuttal for submission to FEC. If you wish to submit a one-page letter of rebuttal, please upload your rebuttal letter using the upload button below by October 15, 2024.
